body.name: Small Crossbody Backpack Sling bag for Men and Women (Black), lightweight Shoulder bag travel hiking Chest bag daypack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SMALL SIZE & LIGHTWEIGHT: Only 12.2x7.1x3.1 in and 12.3 oz. or 0.35KG. The strap can be adjusted to fit from 19.5 to 45in.

LARGE CAPACITY: Large main compartment with inner open pouch, perfect for iPad Mini, Kindle, Small notebooks, large cellphone. 2 front zippered pockets ideal for keys, wallet, headphones. Front loops for sunglasses and 1 bottle.
USB CHARGING PORT: This Shoulder Bag comes equipped with a USB charging port on the side that lets you easily access your power bank or plug head phones into your devices inside the bag.

DURABLE MATERIAL: Made of high quality water, wear and tear resistant polyester with a PVC coated oxford cloth liner on the inside to keep your items safe from rain or sweat. Durable metal hooks on both sides.
COMFORTABLE: One strap reversable sling bag. Can be worn on left or right shoulder. Both the back side of the bag and strap are made with a thick breathable material to keep you cool and comfortable.
SIMPLE STYLE: Simple black design makes it a great fit for almost any outfit Men or Women.
body.description: Our small Crossbody Sling bag with USB charging port is larger than a fanny pack yet smaller than a regular sized backpack. The main zippered compartment is big enough for small tablet, notebook, power bank and more. The Shoulder bag with adjustable strap keeps essentials close at hand when hiking, travel, biking, at theme parks or just casually walking anywhere. Our bag is made up of rugged polyester on the outside with a PVC coated oxford cloth liner on the inside to protect your items from rain or sweat. Designed for comfort, the back of the bag and strap are made of thick and breathable mesh material to keep you comfortable and cool. The Crossbody Backpack can be worn on the back as well as front and is convertible left to right so you can easily change the strap to switch which shoulder it hangs from. Simple Design:The simple black design makes this sling bag the ideal choice for almost any outfit Men or Women. It is equipped with a USB charging port on the side that lets you easily access your power bank or plug your headphones into your device inside the bag. Quality Solid Zippers:The Zipper pulls are good-sized, sturdy and elegant in design making them easy to grasp even when wearing gloves. This keeps your Zippers sliding easy and working smoothly.Features: Simple, stylish, sophisticated, and innovative design. These bags are a must-have for athletes, tourists, hikers and bikers. Crossbody sling bags are small, unique, and ultra-convenient 1 large compartment, 4 smaller pockets, 1 bottle holder. Water resistant, lightweight, durable. Machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new hiking bag! :)
reviews.reviewText: I needed a mini backpack that could hold: My 18oz Hydro Flask, a small lunch, pepper spray, emergency raincoat, my epi pens, my phone, chapstick, & more.This really does the job!! There are many pockets for such a small bag, and it seems like good quality, and I love the look of it. My iPhone X fits perfectly in the outer pocket too! The USB port is also cool, but I haven’t tried it yet.The only thing I worry about is, the strap hurting my shoulder only being on one side the whole time. I might have to switch sides often. But, I guess I’ll find out on my next hike lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Though I don't use it as much now, I love it.
reviews.reviewText: It's sturdy and large enough for me to carry my tablet ,a handheld ,a portable nebulizer and a little bit of food with me. As some of me needs grew, I needed a bigger bag, but as something light and on the go, it does well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Convenient!
reviews.reviewText: The perfect little bag for when you have just enough stuff and not enough pant pocket space for it. Not to mention if you’re like me and gotta have your phone charged all the time the super convenient USB port lets me carry around my power bank super easily! Well made and super comfortable, Definitely Recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like being able to carry personal items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good functional bag
reviews.reviewText: Bag is surprisingly good given its low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect shoulder bag
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size bag bit to big not to bulky perfect for riding sits snug and comfy the quality is above what I would expect sippers are great the buckle is high quality even has an external usb plug you can plug in power pack and keep your bag shut I would recommend this to anyone who rides a bike mountain bike or road bike even just for hiking I would buy more for friends!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Really impressed with this backpack. Its durable, has lots of compartments, and fits more than I expected. It’s very light weight and easy to wear. I like that there is a place for my water bottle and charging bank too. Highly Recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really, really loved the bag until …
reviews.reviewText: The bag is perfect for carrying my daily essentials while at work. Would give a 5+ rating except one of the ring strap holders ripped off and tore open the bag. I’ve owned it for 2 weeks. I’m hoping I got a bad bag because I’m ordering another and will update my review after I have the new bag.
